    "Overly dramatic lighting or shadows",
    "Geometric or rigid compositions",
    "Modernist or abstract distortions"

  "EVALUATION_CRITERIA": [
    "Presence of soft, blended brushstrokes",
    "Muted, naturalistic color palette",
    "Delicate, flowing linework",
    "Atmospheric mist or haze",
    "Asymmetrical, open composition with natural elements"
  ],
  "CONFIDENCE": 0.96
}
